channel.title: package delivery on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in package delivery on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Aramex Logo
Aramex is an Emirati multinational logistics, courier and package delivery company based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The company was founded by Fadi Ghandour and Bill Kingson in 1982 in Amman, Jordan. It is the first Arab-based company to be listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange. Aramex is listed on the Dubai Financial Market. Othman Aljeda serves as the company’s CEO. Aramex has approximately 18,000 employees in 70 countries. Thomas Friedman profiled the company in his book, The World Is Flat.
You can download theAramexlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Aramex
item.description: Aramex is an Emirati multinational logistics, courier and package delivery company based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The company was founded by Fadi Ghandour and Bill Kingson in 1982 in Amman, Jordan. It is the first Arab-based company to be listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange. Aramex is listed on the Dubai Financial Market. Othman Aljeda serves as the company’s CEO. Aramex has approximately 18,000 employees in 70 countries. Thomas Friedman profiled the company in his book, The World Is Flat.
